response.overview: PAPER DOOR, morphs on the material of paper,  the experiential nature of creation, whose themes about our walk on this earth, dreams, working creativity, and eternity are inferred.  Paper is cut and distributed inside an enclosed space that seems to contain no exit. Something wild and unknown enters with the appearance of a bird and a vegetative green color.  When time passes during the making process, it forges a deeper connection within the maker: time transfixes into timelessness for its creator.  Through “making,” a new world is birthed and inhabits the space as the artist-maker disappears and leaves what remains behind to the viewer.
response.title: PAPER DOOR
